#labels DDD,CQRS,OxyBase
=OxyBase=

OxyBase - is a framework meant to help developers to implement custom business logic in DDD (Domain Driven Design) way. That is the most important OxyBase feature! 

OxyBase - is based on so called "CQRS Architecture". 

OxyBase - was tested in real life with real users
